thread.title: A House divided is bad news for Israel
thread.title_full: A House divided is bad news for Israel

title: A House divided is bad news for Israel
text: By Douglas M. Bloomfield 59 minutes ago Font size: John Boehner - Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia en.wikipedia.org The battle to succeed Speaker John Boehner following his sudden but not unexpected resignation will move the House GOP leadership farther to the right and away from the overwhelming majority of Jewish voters. When it comes to the Jewish community, Republicans are essentially a one-issue party. Boehner, like many in his caucus, has been a strongâ€¦
